thread.title: Rohit Sharma: India can't repeat the same mistakes again
thread.title_full: Rohit Sharma: India can't repeat the same mistakes again - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Rohit Sharma: India can't repeat the same mistakes again
text:
*Indore:* Consistency is key to any team's success and opening batsman Rohit Sharma yesterday asserted that India cannot afford to commit small mistakes often if they aspire to be the numero uno cricket team in the world.
*Rohit Sharma*
Currently ranked No 2 in ODIs, India snatched defeat from the jaws of victory in the ODI ... Â»
